Pre-Game Insights: Zimbabwe has played 3 matches in the series and is currently 4th in the points table, while South Africa is playing its first match of the season. South Africa has won 3 of its last 5 matches and lost 2.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at Bellerive Oval, Hobart is expected to be a balanced one, with both batsmen and bowlers expected to get help. In the last 16 matches played at this venue, the average first innings score is 150 runs.
Others: The two teams last played each other in 2018, with Robbie Frylinck scoring 58 fantasy points for South Africa and Sean Williams scoring 103 fantasy points for Zimbabwe.
